mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (username, password, real_name, phone, email, gender, birthday, avatar_url, status) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{avatarUrl}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM member m JOIN booking b ON m.id = b.member_id WHERE b.coach_id = #{coachId}

SELECT CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 18 AND 25 THEN '18-25岁' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 26 AND 35 THEN '26-35岁' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 36 AND 45 THEN '36-45岁' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) >= 46 THEN '46岁以上' ELSE '未知' END as age_group, COUNT(*) as count FROM member WHERE birthday IS NOT NULL GROUP BY age_group ORDER BY CASE age_group WHEN '18-25岁' THEN 1 WHEN '26-35岁' THEN 2 WHEN '36-45岁' THEN 3 WHEN '46岁以上' THEN 4 ELSE 5 END
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') as month, COUNT(*) as count FROM member WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY month

SELECT ct.name as card_type, COUNT(DISTINCT mc.member_id) as count FROM member_card mc INNER JOIN card_type ct ON mc.card_type_id = ct.id WHERE mc.card_status = 1 -- 有效卡 AND mc.payment_status = 1 -- 已支付 GROUP BY ct.id, ct.name ORDER BY count DESC
